CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 18, 1950, pg. 2, reads: "Biggest Night in History - With Ezzard Charles, heavyweight champion, as drawing card, the Centre Avenue branch of the 'Y' staged its biggest report night in history last Friday. The total amount reported was $3,000.  Besides Charles, many other luminaries were present.  Left to right: David M. Roberts, prothonotary: Mrs. Robert L. Vann, Mayor David L. Lawrence, Atty. Paul F. Jones, campaign manager; Executive Secretary James Burgett (standing), Ezzard Charles, Director of Public Works James S. Devlin and Luke Easter, Cleveland Indian baseball star. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: David M. Roberts, Jessie Vann, Mayor David L. Lawrence, Atty. Paul F. Jones, James Burgett (standing), boxer Ezzard Charles, James S. Devlin, and baseball player Luke Easter, seated behind banquet table in Centre Avenue YMCA
